title: Playlist Duration Calculator
description: Estimate total play time with track counts or a list of durations.

helper.fallback: If the list is empty, we calculate using track count + average length.
helper.list: Use mm:ss or hh:mm:ss per line.

openGraph.title: Playlist Duration Calculator
openGraph.description: Calculate total playlist length from track counts or pasted time lists. Estimate total duration, average track length, and copy a clean summary in seconds.
